sections.heading: of application and construction
sections.text: In applying and construing the Uniform Trust Decanting Act, consideration must be given to the need to promote uniformity of the law with respect to its subject matter among states that enact it.SourceLaws 2020, LB808, ยง 38.

30-4528.Uniformity of application and construction.

In applying and construing the Uniform Trust Decanting Act, consideration must be given to the need to promote uniformity of the law with respect to its subject matter among states that enact it.

SourceLaws 2020, LB808, ยง 38.
